page.title: 08 Leisure
page.content: The people in Hanbury have quite a lot of opportunities to play sport.There's the Adventurers for children, a Recrea tion ground, Tennis courts, a Badminton club and a Cricket Club.The Cricket ground is near New Lodge Private school.The Adventurers is run by Mrs Page and costs 20p.It is on monday from 6pm to 7.30pm.They play games and do Nature treks.They go in the Hall when it's wet.Badminton is also at the Hall and run by Mrs Montgomery.It costs 10p for an hour at 6pm to 7pm and 7pm to 8pm. There is a Tennis court at the hall and a Recreation ground behind the School.But if they want to go swimming or play football they have to go to Burton or Uttoxeter by car or bus.
